rewards.description: ð® Announcing Kakele Online's Epic Twitch Drops!  Embark on a unique journey in Kakele's realm. Dive into mystical lands, conquer quests, and enjoy our exciting Twitch Drops for enhanced gaming. Unlock rewards, including teleports, herbs, potions, and materials.  ð Timed Rewards: Enjoy cities Teleports, Ultra potions, Gold Refiner Kits and collect Dog Cards and Trophies.  ð° Prosperity Path: Gain Copper, Tin, Silver, Iron, Gold, Life Herbs, Mana Herbs for success. Accumulate Reputation Coins.  ð Grand Finale: End with an exclusive Twitch Drop and Bacon Extravaganza surprise! Link accounts, watch streams, and claim rewards for an unforgettable RPG experience.  ð How to Join:  Link Accounts: Connect your account and Twitch in the game app. Watch Streams: Tune in during to your favorite Kakele streamer. Claim Rewards: Receive Twitch Drop notifications claim in the game app.  Influencers: To enable drops on your stream, email us!  Don't miss the chance to enrich your journey with Twitch Drops!

rewards.description: Starting in Split 1, Riot Games is introducing Twitch Subscriptions to select LoL Esports broadcast channels! This new initiative offers fans an enhanced viewing experience while providing direct support to their favorite leagues and teams. Subscribers with paid and gifted Tier 1 subscriptions will unlock exclusive in-game rewards through Twitchâs Drop Fest. Subscribers can earn the special âWhy Though?â emote by subscribing to participating channels.

rewards.description: Subscribe or Gift a Sub to your favorite opted-in Destiny 2 streamer and receive the Heretical Halation Emblem! This Emblem will be available from 11 February at 9AM PT until 4 March at 9AM PT. You must link your Bungie account to Twitch to receive the Emblem. You can redeem the Emblem by logging into your Bungie.net account and going to the Partner Rewards section of the Code Redemption area.
